column4: Can I have some help with hard drive recovery? Ubiquity messed up my current main hard drive, and I'm trying to see if there's a way to recover some of my data, for more info read at http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=1132513 basically, I got xubuntu installed over my main ubuntu partition, and I'm trying to recover some data from it... any ideas?
the only thing i know in this business are windows tools :X
try tools from Ontrack and O&O
but for sake dont write anything to your main hdd
yes, you have to register it to use pm here
well... not really, cause I didn't get any of your pms, can I have a link to ontrack?
ok, I will try that, thank you so much
